title: Wan Jie Qi Yuan
overview: Lin Feng is an orphan who was adopted by Wu Village. One day he accidentally entered a forbidden land in the vicinity of Wu village where he found an ice coffin containing a beautiful woman. Ling Feng carelessly opened the ice coffin. The woman inside woke up and saw that Ling Feng was a special person of the demon race. She decided to help him, causing great physical changes in him. Since that day, many strange things began to happen in Wu village. With Ling Feng now having great power, how will he handle these situations?
